title: Sound On: Positive GDP, Putin Nuke Denial
itunes:title: Sound On: Positive GDP, Putin Nuke Denial
description:
Joe spoke with Moody's Chief Economist Mark Zandi on the state of the economy and 3rd quarter GDP numbers, Bloomberg finance correspondent Sonali Basak on Wall Street donations and the midterms. Plus our politics panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis on the rebounding GDP numbers and what it means for the midterms, following the money on Wall Street midterm donations, Putin's denial he's planning to use nuclear weapons. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
